record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2972 AND S. 2973
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2972 AND S. 2973 -- (Senate - May 02, 2008)

[Page: S3750]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, there are two bills at the desk. I ask for their first reading en bloc.

record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2972) to reauthorize and modernize the Federal Aviation Administration.
A bill (S. 2973) to promote the energy security of the United States and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for a second reading and, in order to place the bills on the calendar under the provisions of rule XIV, I object to my own request, all en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
